question.title: How do I increase the height (thickness) of each row item in a ListView?
question.body:
I am making an app with a ListView in Android Studio, but each list item is too thin. I want to be able to click each item in the list and having them be this thin will not be feasible (and it doesn't look as good).

How can I increase the height (thickness) of all list items in my ListView?

XML code:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:id="@+id/main"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    tools:context=".MainActivity">

<TextView
    android:id="@+id/textView2"
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:fontFamily="sans-serif-black"
    android:text="SuperCO2"
    android:textSize="34sp"
    app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.498"
    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.045" />

<TextView
    android:id="@+id/textView"
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:text="An analysis tool for the CO2 emissions of the world."
    app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView2"
    app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.014" />

<ListView
    android:id="@+id/list"
    android:layout_width="360dp"
    android:layout_height="355dp"
    app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.496"
    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView3"
    app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.167" />

<TextView
    android:id="@+id/textView3"
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:fontFamily="sans-serif-black"
    android:text="Top 10 emitters, 2022"
    app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView"
    app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.261" />

<EditText
    android:id="@+id/search"
    android:layout_width="204dp"
    android:layout_height="51dp"
    android:ems="10"
    android:hint="Search for a country..."
    android:inputType="text"
    android:textColor="@android:color/black"
    app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/textView3"
    app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.497"
    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView"
    app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.237" />

<ImageView
    android:id="@+id/imageView"
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/textView3"
    app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@+id/search"
    app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.987"
    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/textView"
    app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.311"
    app:srcCompat="?android:attr/actionModeWebSearchDrawable" />

<Button
    android:id="@+id/searchBtn"
    android:layout_width="101dp"
    android:layout_height="50dp"
    android:layout_marginTop="12dp"
    android:backgroundTint="@android:color/holo_green_light"
    android:backgroundTintMode="add"
    android:text="Search"
    android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Body1"
    android:textSize="12sp"
    app:iconTint="#E6D8D8"
    app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@+id/textView3"
    app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/search"
    app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.0" />

<Button
    android:id="@+id/filter"
    android:layout_width="158dp"
    android:layout_height="58dp"
    android:backgroundTint="@android:color/holo_green_light"
    android:backgroundTintMode="add"
    android:text="Filter by Year"
    android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Body1"
    android:textSize="16sp"
    app:iconTint="#E6D8D8"
    app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
    app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/list" />

</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

question_comments.body: @tomerpacific I'm a real noob with this stuff so I'm not sure if this is what you wanted but here's the xml file that's the "layout": <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <TextView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:ellipsize="marquee" android:singleLine="true" android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceListItem‌​Small" android:paddingStart="32dp" android:paddingEnd="32dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" />
As mentioned, please share the layout for the items in your listview. The layout for each item in the listview can be changed to accommodate what you are looking for.

That is determined by the layout used for the list items. Note that ListView has been obsolete for a decade; please consider using RecyclerView or switching to Jetpack Compose and its LazyColumn() composable.
